sources.title: It Always Rains On Sunday
sources.description: Slice of life drama following the lives of various people in London's East End on a wet Sunday. Rose was engaged to local wild boy Tommy Swann but he got imprisoned on Dartmoor. After he was locked up she got married to sedate but dull George. Tommy's now broken out of jail and comes to see Rose to get help to flee the country.Â

metadata.Plot: Slice of life drama following the lives of various people in London's East End on a wet Sunday. (Is this film why people think it always rains in England ?) Rose was engaged to local wild boy Tommy Swann but he got imprisoned on Dartmoor. After he was locked up she got married to sedate but dull George. Tommy's now broken out of jail and comes to see Rose to get help to flee the country.
metadata.Writer: Arthur La Bern, Angus MacPhail, Robert Hamer
metadata.Actors: Googie Withers, Jack Warner, John McCallum
